## weightedAverage() function

Calculates the weighted average of a set of values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function weightedAverage<T>(weights: number[], values: T[], funcLerp: (a: T, b: T, w: number) => T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  weights | number\[\] | An array of weights for each value. |
|  values | T\[\] | An array of values to be averaged. |
|  funcLerp | (a: T, b: T, w: number) =&gt; T | A function that performs linear interpolation between two values of type T. |

**Returns:**

T

The weighted average of the values.
